name: DeMorris Glasper
text: Godfather's Pizza is a dying breed however this location has held on in the test of time.  The pizza is cheesy and taste delicious.  I personally like the Golden crust which is nice rich buttery flavor to pair with any of specialty pizzas. ‚Ä¶More

name: Vick C
text: Decent pizza buffet, but out of the 15 pizzas on the buffet 13 of them were cheese and sausage pizza. I asked for a supreme pizza and it was never made. The soda fountain was flat, even after they added carbonation. The pizza was good, they just need to have different varieties.

name: Jake Van
text:
I'm not gonna lie. This is probably my favorite pizza place.
I drive a good ways to go here and enjoy the buffet when I can.
Great atmosphere and nostalgic. ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Hilgenberg
text: Amazing pizza! Got the classic combo on original crust and it was a good as ever. Keep up the good work and I'll see you again next week!

name: J Archuleta
text: Evening buffet is 5-7:30pm. Friendly and polite from the start. Even as the cashier was busy as we walked in, she made sure to let us know she would be right with us.  The buffet was fresh and stocked. Salad bar is included and they even ‚Ä¶More

name: Alan B
text: Great pizzas, friendly staff, excellent coupons, lunch and dinner buffet, yummy monkey bread pizza, and the pictures on the walls are pretty neat. What's not to love?

name: Michelle Belknap
text: Great location and service! The place was very clean and they were all very friendly. We missed being able to sit down and eat when they closed the Blue Springs location years ago. We were so happy when we found them.

name: Jim L
text: Best Godfathers left in the KC area. Godfathers has been my favorite pizza place all my life. The one I used to go to closed down and there are a couple others closer to me, but this is the only one in town that makes a Godfathers pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Hetherington
text: By far the best pizza buffet around. Great pizza selection, always fresh, most importantly - a great and very attentive staff.

name: Colton Adams
text: Taco pizza is the best around. I only go during the buffet hours - M-Sat 11-1:30 and 5-7:30. They can be a little slow at putting out new fresh pizza. Don't be afraid to ask for something. If they aren't busy they aren't putting out pizza. They also have the fancy Coca-Cola machine where you can pick different flavors.

name: Jeanie Sullivan
text: We chose Godfathers for a get together with the family. We love the buffet. They are constantly adding more pizza and if they do not have the pizza you are wanting you can ask them to make it. They also have there monkey bread, chicken ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Tesar
text: Love thier lunch buffet. Hot and fresh. And always new choices. And don't forget the dessert pizzt. Yum.

name: James Wollard
text: $16 for a small 2 topping? Mostly bread. Had plenty of hamburger but second topping of black olives was only 13 little slices. 2 slices on each piece? Why bother. I'll stick with pizza shoppe.

text: I enjoy Godfather's. I like the flavor better than other usual pizza places.
